author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
incorrect position of a parameter which resulted in the args passed as input instead of as args

fix https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/4923

For more information about the roles of Reviewer and Assignee, refer to [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md).

-->
title: correct passing of parameter so args show up as args instead of input
